glosses: to melt, thaw, dissolve, become liquid
to waste away, get thin and weak, become emaciated

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish اریمك (erimek), from Proto-Turkic *ẹri- (“to melt”). Cognate with Azerbaijani ərimək, Bashkir иреү (irew), Kazakh еру (eru), Kyrgyz эрүү (erüü), Yakut ир (ir, “to melt”), Turkmen eremek, Tuvan эриир (eriir), Uzbek erimoq.
